Computer.name: Halcyon Private Investigations LLC IRC Channel

IRCDaemon.name: PI Chat
IRCDaemon.post: Hey, Carl, how's the case with the kid going?
Well, I feel like police are doing their work, but I still keep a look at it.
It's been three months, John, best that can happen is we never find him ever.
Stuff like this is why I left the department, remember?
Well, perhaps. Anyway. There's something too wrong about this Providence case
Information vaporizes before my eyes. Got a bad feeling about this.
